description.@en: You temporarily dispel the Prince of Change’s twisted Magicks and the Prince of Pleasure’s depravity over another.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch is temporarily relieved of any ill-effects which Magick has over them and instantly breaks any charms or curses (Magickal or otherwise) they may be under the Effects of.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the Duration.

criticalFailure.@en: You have failed the Outsider! Not only do you fail to relieve the person you touched of the ill-effects of Magick or charms or curses they are under, but all of those Effects are imparted upon you and their Duration is tripled.

reagents.@en: An ampule of quicksilver, injected into the recipient (expended)
